languages.text: "Я слышу, что в твоей груди бьются два железных сердца. Одно принадлежит воину, другое — жрецу. С каким из них ты родился?"
"I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"
languages.original_text: "Я слышу, что в твоей груди бьются два железных сердца. Одно принадлежит воину, другое — жрецу. С каким из них ты родился?"

traits.locale_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"
"I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"
"I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"
"I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

languages.text: “我听说你的胸口有两颗铁心脏在跳动，一颗属于战士，一颗属于牧师。哪颗才是你天生的心脏？”
languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

traits.locale_text: “我听说你的胸口有两颗铁心脏在跳动，一颗属于战士，一颗属于牧师。哪颗才是你天生的心脏？”

languages.text: « J'entends deux cœurs de métal battre dans votre poitrine. L'un appartient à un guerrier, et l'autre à un prêtre. Avec lequel êtes-vous né ? »
languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

traits.locale_text: « J'entends deux cœurs de métal battre dans votre poitrine. L'un appartient à un guerrier, et l'autre à un prêtre. Avec lequel êtes-vous né ? »

languages.text: "Wie ich höre, schlagen in Eurer Brust zwei Herzen aus Eisen. Das eine gehört einem Krieger, das andere einem Priester. Mit welchem der beiden wurdet Ihr geboren?"
languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich höre, schlagen in Eurer Brust zwei Herzen aus Eisen. Das eine gehört einem Krieger, das andere einem Priester. Mit welchem der beiden wurdet Ihr geboren?"

languages.text: 「あんたの胸の中で2つの鉄の心臓が鼓動しているのが聞こえる。1つは戦士のもの。もう1つは司祭のもの。あんたはどちらを持って生まれたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

traits.locale_text: 「あんたの胸の中で2つの鉄の心臓が鼓動しているのが聞こえる。1つは戦士のもの。もう1つは司祭のもの。あんたはどちらを持って生まれたんだ？」

languages.text: «Oigo dos corazones férreos latir en tu pecho. Uno es de guerrero y el otro de sacerdote. ¿Con cuál de los dos naciste?».
languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

traits.locale_text: «Oigo dos corazones férreos latir en tu pecho. Uno es de guerrero y el otro de sacerdote. ¿Con cuál de los dos naciste?».

languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

languages.text: "Göğsünde atan iki demir yüreğin sesini duyuyorum. Biri savaşçıya, biri de rahibe ait. Hangisiyle doğmuştun?"
languages.original_text: "I hear two hearts of iron beating in your chest. One belongs to a warrior, the other to a priest. Which one were you born with?"

traits.locale_text: "Göğsünde atan iki demir yüreğin sesini duyuyorum. Biri savaşçıya, biri de rahibe ait. Hangisiyle doğmuştun?"
